name: three_circles_flag
explanation: Boolean indicating if agent is modeled with three circle model

name: orientable_flag
explanation: Boolean indicating if agent is orientable

name: active
explanation: Boolean indicating if agent is active

name: goal_reached
explanation: Boolean indicating if goal is reahed

name: inertia_rot
explanation: Rotational moment for agent of weight 80 kg and radius 0.27

name: tau_adj
explanation: Characteristic time for agent adjusting its  movement

name: tau_rot
explanation: Characteristic time for agent adjusting its  rotational movement

name: std_rand_force
explanation: Standard deviation for random force from truncated normal distribution

name: std_rand_torque
explanation: Standard deviation for random torque from truncated normal distribution

name: f_soc_ij_max
explanation: Truncation for social force with agent to agent interaction

name: f_soc_iw_max
explanation: Truncation for social force with agent to wall interaction

name: sight_soc
explanation: Maximum distance for social force to effect

name: sight_wall
explanation: Maximum distance for social force to effect
